text: :See Aureliana Civitas for the Latin name of Orléans.'' Aureliana is a genus of plants in the family Solanaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Aureliana fasciculata (Vell.) Sendtn. ==References== Category:Physaleae Category:Solanaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aureliana
